圛字的基本解释

圛
yì
（云气）连接不断。

圛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》羊益切，入昔，以。］
(1)回曲而行。
(2)云气稀疏貌。

圛字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【囗字部】　圛； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页221第11
【唐韻】羊益切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】夷益切，?音睪。【說文】回行也。引逸周書，圛圛升雲，半有半無。【徐鍇曰】洪範卜五，曰雨，曰霽，曰蒙，曰圛，曰克。圛者，象氣絡繹不絕也。半有半無，卽史龜筴傳所謂雨不雨，霽不霽，氣不聯屬之說也。《今文尚書》作驛。

圛字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
圛字的起名意思

暂无。

mist rolling upwards
Basic explanation of words
mist rolling upwards
yì
(Yunqi) The connection is constant.
mist rolling upwards
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" Yang Yi cut, into the past, to. ]
(1) Go back and forth.
(2) The appearance of cloud gas is sparse.
mist rolling upwards
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [囗字部] 　圛; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 221-11
[Tang Yun] Sheep Yi Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Yi Yi cut,? Yin Sui. [Said Wen] Return to the line. Quoting the Zhou Shu, 圛圛rising clouds, half and half nothing. [Xu Kai said] Hong Fan Buwu said rain, Ji, Meng, 圛, and Ke. Those who hold it are like a continuous flow of air. Half there and half nothing, Shi Guijia said that the so-called rain does not rain, Ji does not Ji, and Qi is not affiliated. "Jinwen Shangshu" as a station.
